scripts.build: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt build
scripts.dev: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt dev
scripts.dev-win: set HOSTNAME=0 && set PORT=8900 && nuxt dev
scripts.generate: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt generate
scripts.preview: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt preview
scripts.postinstall: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt prepare
scripts.production: NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` NUXT_PUBLIC_GIT_URL=`git config --get remote.origin.url` HOSTNAME=0 PORT=8900 nuxt start
